channel.title: [PI] please read
channel.description: i tried to change the background of a client and when i did it turns out like this: [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2n7o95u.jpg[/img] i messed with the sprites but i dont know how to fix it also idc if this isnt in the right topic, nobody looks at client help and i need this badly

item.title: [PI] please read
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:4, topic:399690”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=496815.msg3632710#msg3632710 date=1308357251]

Whatever tutorial you followed (if you even followed one), it didn’t tell you what to do.

Go look up a tutorial. The search bar is your friend.

i didnt need a tutorial because i’m not a noob coder.
and i already searched for it

a lot of the clients mirror the background exactly in the middle.

oh well how can i fix this? because my friend really needs this
[/quote]

Use photoshop or paint to just mirror it ?[/quote]
did it and it shows up the same

Read full topic
